text:
Family Violence Amendment Act 2015

An Act to amend the Family Violence Act 2004 and the Justices Act 1959
[Royal Assent 6 October 2015]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Family Violence Amendment Act 2015 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

PART 2 - Family Violence Act 2004 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Family Violence Act 2004 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Family Violence Act 2004 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Family Violence Act 2004 .

6.

7.

12.

13.

PART 3 - Justices Act 1959 Amended

14.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Justices Act 1959 .

15.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Justices Act 1959 .

PART 4 - Repeal of Act

16. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the three hundred and sixty fifth day from the day on which it commences.
